title: Bug 112458 - Property Editor Displays Layout Items' Properties in Master Page Viewer
description: The issue is related to the Property Editor showing the properties of layout items when switching to the Master Page viewer.
EB: The expected behavior is that when switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor should change to display Master Page properties. The actual result, as mentioned, is that it continues to show the properties of the label or layout item.
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are not provided in the report. To verify the bug, additional steps are needed to demonstrate the problem and confirm that the Property Editor is displaying the wrong properties in the Master Page viewer.
